# MLOpenHack15

# WebAPI
POST: http://adventureworksmodelapi.azurewebsites.net/predict/url
```json
{
    "url":"http://demandware.edgesuite.net/aakn_prd/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-bdel/default/dw02dfa3bb/products/helmets/620215_ENGR_Vapor_Helmet_Front_web.jpg"
}	
```
POST: http://adventureworksmodelapi.azurewebsites.net/predict/img
```json
{
    "image":""}	
```

# Docker
docker build --rm -f Dockerfile -t adventureworksmodelapi .
docker tag adventureworksmodelapi kenakamu/adventureworksmodelapi
docker push kenakamu/adventureworksmodelapi
docker run --rm -d -p 8080:80 adventureworksmodelapi:latest
